nodes.text: Skahvi Renlow was a Togruta pirate and smuggler active during the Imperial Era, where it preyed upon Imperial Forces, particularly prison ships, traveling across Hyperspace routes. The Togruta owned the BT-900 bulk transport Icarii-7. At one point before the Battle of Xorrn, the Icaari-7 was being repaired and upgraded at Foundry Four on the planet of Xorrn. It was in charge of a crew mostly composed of convicts and former slaves.
